Reviews.Title: Perfect for Child's First Camera
Reviews.Author: Sharlee S. Petruzzi "ssp60"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 10 year old and it's perfect. Easy menus with all the features of an "adult" camera.

Reviews.Author: C. Jordan "flash help!"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, which was received as a gift.  it is easy to use, simple instructions.  just having a hard time figuring out the flash---i'm positive there are better products out there, but for the price, it does the job.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1Mp CMOS Sensor
2.7" LCD
640x480 VGA Video Capture
SD Memory Card Slot
Face Detection
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar ViviCam F128 Digital Camera
